address1: 19 Halsted Rd Unit 14 Wharfside Park, Kwazulu-Natal, Pietermaritzburg, 3201

partnerDetails.about: Established in 2012, Livecopper is South Africa's no.1 online supply company for Light fittings, Electrical consumables and Plumbing products. Through a daily determination and dedication we bring you some of the most trusted and established industry and International brands available in South Africa today. Our service levels are not easily matched and we strive for excellence in every transaction as we passionately serve our customers throughout all 9 provinces in South Africa.
